title: Catalytic activity of Cu-cysteine coated on Ti3C2MXene toward peroxymonosulfate activation for carbamazepine degradation
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00342J, Paper
Pascaline Sanga, Haitham Saad Al-mashriqi, Jing Xiao, Jia Chen, Hongdeng Qiu
The growing prevalence of pharmaceutical pollutants in water bodies poses a significant threat to the enviromnent, underscoring the urgent need for more effective and sustainable methods for removing these pollutants....
